svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

value="1枚のテクスチャ画像は第1引数で指定した解像度で作成される" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontColor=#009900;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="920" y="1500" <mxPoint x="909" y="1540" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="921" y="1519" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="veM63i1ycSKrCORmmkQx-45" value="→ 最終的に生成されるキューブ環境テクスチャのサイズ (≒解像度) x="915" y="1530" width="200" height="70" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="veM63i1ycSKrCORmmkQx-46" value="new WebGLCubeRenderTarget(<span style="color: rgb(0, 153, 0);">256</span>)" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="895" y="1330" width="215" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="veM63i1ycSKrCORmmkQx-47" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.86;exitY=0.667;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;strokeColor=#009900;strokeWidth=2;" edge="1" parent="1"> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

path.style: fill: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 105px; margin-left: 41px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 255px; margin-left: 251px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #009900;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#009900, #32b532); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 1枚のテクスチャ画像は第1引数で指定した解像度で作成される

switch.text: 1枚のテクスチャ画像は第1引数で指定した解像度で作成される

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 35px; margin-left: 96px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
WebGLCubeRenderTargetの
コンストラクタの第1引数

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 305px; margin-left: 246px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #FF0000;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#FF0000, #ff9090); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
→ 最終的に生成されるキューブ環境テクスチャのサイズ (≒解像度) は
指定した第1引数 × 6 になる
(6枚の画像で構成されるから)

switch.text: → 最終的に生成されるキューブ環境テクスチャのサイズ (≒解像度) は...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 213px; height: 1px; padding-top: 85px; margin-left: 226px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 153, 0), rgb(50, 181, 50)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 153, 0), rgb(50, 181, 50));

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
